name: Potion
description: Restores 40 HP.

name: Super Potion
description: Restores 80 HP.

name: Ultra Potion
description: Restores 120 HP.

name: Max Potion
description: Restores 200 HP.

name: Ether
description: Restores 60 stamina.

name: Super Ether
description: Restores 100 stamina.

name: Ultra Ether
description: Restores 150 stamina.

name: Max Ether
description: Restores 200 stamina.

name: Elixir
description: Restores both 50 HP and 50 stamina.

name: Super Elixir
description: Restores both 90 HP and 90 stamina.

name: Ultra Elixir
description: Restores both 140 HP and 140 stamina.

name: Max Elixir
description: Restores both 200 HP and 200 stamina.

name: Revive
description: Restores a fainted Nexomon along with 50 HP.

name: Super Revive
description: Restores a fainted Nexomon along with 80 HP.

name: Ultra Revive
description: Restores a fainted Nexomon along with 120 HP.

name: Anti Burn
description: Cures the BURNING status effect on a Nexomon!

name: Anti Paralyze
description: Cures the PARALYZED status effect on a Nexomon!

name: Anti Poison
description: Cures the POISONED status effect on a Nexomon!

name: Anti Freeze
description: Cures the FROZEN status effect on a Nexomon!

name: Anti Sleep
description: Cures the ASLEEP status effect on a Nexomon!

name: Anti Confusion
description: Cures the CONFUSED status effect on a Nexomon!

name: Anti Bind
description: Cures the BOUND status effect on a Nexomon!

name: Nexotrap
description: A basic tool used to capture wild Nexomon.

name: Golden Nexotrap
description: A perfect Nexotrap that can capture any Nexomon no matter what!

name: Fire Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Fire-type Nexomon!

name: Water Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Water-type Nexomon!

name: Wind Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Wind-type Nexomon!

name: Plant Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Plant-type Nexomon!

name: Electric Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Electric-type Nexomon!

name: Mineral Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Mineral-type Nexomon!

name: Ghost Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Ghost-type Nexomon!

name: Psychic Nexotrap
description: A Nexotrap designed to capture Psychic-type Nexomon!

name: Destruction Core (I)
description: Boosts the ATK stat by 4%.

name: Desctruction Core (II)
description: Boosts the ATK stat by 7%.

name: Desctruction Core (III)
description: Boosts the ATK stat by 10%.

name: Protection Core (I)
description: Boosts the DEF stat by 4%.

name: Protection Core (II)
description: Boosts the DEF stat by 7%.

name: Protection Core (III)
description: Boosts the DEF stat by 10%.

name: Vitality Core (I)
description: Boosts the HP stat by 5%.

name: Vitality Core (II)
description: Boosts the HP stat by 7%.

name: Vitality Core (III)
description: Boosts the HP stat by 12%.

name: Stamina Core (I)
description: Boosts the STA stat by 6%.

name: Stamina Core (II)
description: Boosts the STA stat by 12%.

name: Stamina Core (III)
description: Boosts the STA stat by 15%.

name: Immunity Core (I)
description: Decreases the chance of receiving status effects by 5%.

name: Immunity Core (II)
description: Decreases the chance of receiving status effects by 10%.

name: Immunity Core (III)
description: Decreases the chance of receiving status effects by 15%.

name: Experience Core (I)
description: Boosts the EXP earned by 7%.

name: Experience Core (II)
description: Boosts the EXP earned by 13%.

name: Experience Core (III)
description: Boosts the EXP earned by 20%.

name: Synergy Core (I)
description: Copies 8% of the EXP received by other team members without having to fight.

name: Synergy Core (II)
description: Copies 16% of the EXP received by other team members without having to fight.

name: Synergy Core (III)
description: Copies 25% of the EXP received by other team members without having to fight.

name: Greed Core (I)
description: Boosts the amount of coins earned in battle by 3%.

name: Greed Core (II)
description: Boosts the amount of coins earned in battle by 6%.

name: Greed Core (III)
description: Boosts the amount of coins earned in battle by 9%.

name: Blazing Shard
description: A Fire-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Ocean Shard
description: A Water-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Temptest Shard
description: A Wind-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Nature Shard
description: A Plant-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Thunder Shard
description: An Electric-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Stone Shard
description: A Mineral-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Phantom Shard
description: A Ghost-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Mind Shard
description: A Psychic-type elemental shard. Use it for crafting or selling!

name: Perfect Berry
description: The ultimate meal! There is no Nexomon that can resist this!

name: Strawberry Cake
description: A delicious cake with strawberry top.

name: Canele
description: An original recipe! Chocolate cake with a red berry gelatin top.

name: Lemon Pie
description: A rich lemon-flavored cake filled with delicious cream.

name: Onigiri
description: A traditional rice ball with subtle salty flavors.

name: Shrimpgiri
description: Delicious and fresh rice with a funny looking top. Ideal for youngsters.

name: Taco
description: Made of fresh ingredients and wrapped by a crunchy tortilla.

name: Lacreme
description: Vanilla flavored ice cream filled with fresh nuts and sweet cream.

name: Omelette
description: Only fresh eggs are used to create this masterpiece. Ideal for breakfast.

name: Pandulce
description: A simple dish, very simple to bake thus making it ideal for travelers.

name: Baguette
description: Especially made to remain fresh for days! It can be served with both sweet and salty dishes.

name: Donut
description: A classic among tamers. It is not recommended to eat in large portions.

name: Chocolate Muffin
description: A soft muffin filled with the sweetest chocolate you can find!

name: Flan
description: A wiggly dessert with a cherry on top. It is not too sweet, just enough to give it proper flavor.

name: Green Cake
description: A delicious cake made with the finest green tea.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Only for chocolate fanatics. This rich flavored chocolate cake can be sometimes too sweet for some.

name: Glazed Cake
description: A delicious pie mixed with fresh berries and fruits on top.

name: Cream Puff
description: A creamy dessert, it melts almost immediately inside your mouth.

name: Pink Pecana
description: A colorful dish. Very popular among young girls and some Nexomon too!

name: Watermelon
description: A juicy fruit perfect for hot days. A favorite among tamers in the southern areas.

name: Orange
description: A sweet and juicy orange. It needs lots of sunshine and water to grow!

name: Banana
description: A standard banana. Hard to preserve for long periods.

name: Apple
description: A sweet apple, ideal for long trips. It is easily found in the outskirts of any town.

name: Grape
description: Usually used as an ingredient for desserts but it can also be eaten by itself. Very healthy!

name: Peach
description: A seasonal fruit. Grab them while you can!

name: Green Pear
description: It is said this fruit is not only delicious and easy to find but it is also used to make refreshing and healthy beverages.

name: Fries
description: Fast food. Good for a quick snack, very popular among young tamers.

name: Sausage
description: A product usually made of fake meat. Not the healthiest dish but definitely has a strong flavor.

name: Pincho
description: A simple snack that includes a variety of fresh and delicious ingredients.

name: Egg Tart
description: A very exclusive dish and it is not easy to cook. It requires a certain mastery to be cooked correctly.

name: Meat
description: A simple dish that packs a strong flavor and a great source of energy!

name: Tyrant Relic
description: An ancient relic that once belonged to a so-called Tyrant of Light...

name: Coin
description: This can be exchanged for goods and services.

name: Challenge Badge
description: Tamers across the world will want to rematch you even sooner!

name: Repel Spray
description: Avoids any wild battle, including caves! You can enable or disable this item.

name: Cosmic Charm
description: It's said that this improves the chance of finding very peculiar Nexomon...

name: Healthy Charm
description: Causes your team to restore 3% HP after each battle. This can be stacked.

name: Workout Charm
description: Causes your team to restore 3% stamina after each battle. This can be stacked.

name: Pickaxe
description: A tool used to break small boulders that might contain elemental shards!

name: Black Nexomite
description: A fake legendary gemstone of immeasurable value!

name: Tower Key
description: Atlanta says that this key can open a locked door in the Cursed Tower...

name: Shrine Key
description: A key given by Lydia used to open an ancient shrine located in Drake Isles.

name: Cadium Key
description: A key used to access Amelie's secret hideout in Cadium.

name: Vault Key
description: An ancient key that can unlock a secret treasure vault. But where?

name: Drake Vial
description: A mysterious substance developed to lure dragons!

name: Explosives
description: A bunch of explosives prepared for Videll.

name: Bonnie's Access Card
description: Bonnie's credentials to let you enter Khan Woods, located in Parum!

name: Bronze Badge
description: A badge worn by rookie tamers. This proves that you're a member of the Tamer's Guild!

name: Silver Badge
description: A badge granted to those who perform heroic acts! Keep up the good work!

name: Golden Badge
description: A high ranking badge. Proof of your hard work and dedication for the Tamer's Guild!

name: Grandmaster Badge
description: Only the strongest tamers in the entire world can wear this. Stand proud!

name: Drake Sigil
description: A gift of Lydia's. With this, the people of Drake Isles should now accept you into their village!

name: Laterian Sigil
description: A mark of respect among Laterians, proof that you're a true warrior!

name: Airship Ticket
description: Use this ticket to board the Drake Isles airship.

name: Stolen Letter
description: A letter that was stolen from Liam, the mailman.

name: Experimental Lure
description: A strange lure that attracts extinct Nexomon to you while exploring the wild.

name: Tribute of Power
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Blaze
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Ocean
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Tempest
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Nature
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Thunder
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Stone
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Decay
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Tribute of Mind
description: An ancient elemental relic emitting a faint aura...

name: Normal Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Normal-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Fire Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Fire-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Water Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Water-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Plant Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Plant-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Wind Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Wind-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Electric Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Electric-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Mineral Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Mineral-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Psychic Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Psychic-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Ghost Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture Ghost-Type Nexomon. This can be stacked!

name: Dragon Whistle
description: With this item, NexoTraps are 3% more likely to capture dragons. This can be stacked!

name: Ultra Pickaxe
description: With this, mining ore boulders will yield more shards than usual!

name: Secret Sauce
description: Any meal you feed a wild Nexomon will be 3% more effective. This can be stacked!

name: Running Shoes
description: Having this item guarantees that you can escape from any wild battle.

name: Greed Wallet
description: Having this item in your inventory causes battles to yield 10% more coins! This can be stacked!

name: Exp Booster
description: Having this item in your inventory causes enemies to yield 3% more EXP! This can be stacked!

name: Discount Voucher
description: Merchants will lower thier prices by 3%! This item can be stacked!

name: Miner's Goggles
description: With this item, ore boulders will take less time to respawn!

name: Resurrection Blueprint
description: A very complicated machine could be built with these...

name: Pile of Garbage
description: Rubbish that we found while cleaning up the city.

name: Lisa's Lunch
description: Food that Lisa, the Nexotrap crafter, made us pay for.

name: Precious Ring
description: A very valuable ring! Someone must have lost it...

name: Supply Box
description: A box full of valuable tamer supplies! Someone needs this delivered!
